title: Engineering and application of LacI mutants with stringent expressions.
authors: Wu J, Liang C, Li Y, Zeng Y, Sun X, Jiang P, Chen W, Xiong D, Jin JM, Tang SY
abstract: Optimal transcriptional regulatory circuits are expected to exhibit stringent control, maintaining silence in the absence of inducers while exhibiting a broad induction dynamic range upon the addition of effectors. In the P
